li.p: income and expenses resulting from the unit of account selected for an asset or liability; or

components of such income and expenses if those components have different characteristics and are identified separately. For example, a change in the current value of an asset can include the effects of value changes and the accrual of interest (see TableÂ 6.1). It would be appropriate to classify those components separately if doing so would enhance the usefulness of the resulting financial information.
